data.chText: 苗条的；纤细的
data.enText: thin, in a way that is attractive

data.chText: 苗条的体形 / 身材；纤细的腰肢
她是个瘦高个儿。
你是怎样把身材保持得这么苗条的？
data.enText: How do you manage to stay so slim?

data.chText: 许多公司的员工比过去少多了。
data.enText: Many companies are a lot slimmer than they used to be (= have fewer workers) .

data.chText: 单薄的
一本薄薄的诗集
微薄的；不足的；少的；小的
data.enText: not as big as you would like or expect

data.chText: 成功的可能性不大
该党以微弱多数重新上台。
data.enText: The party was returned to power with a slim majority .

data.chText: （靠节食等）变苗条，减肥

before.enText: usually used in the progressive tenses

data.enText: to try to become thinner, for example by eating less

data.chText: 你减肥也可以吃早饭嘛！
data.enText: You can still eat breakfast when you are slimming.

data.chText: （靠节食等）变苗条，减肥
data.enText: to become thinner, for example as a result of eating less

data.chText: 精简（机构）；裁减（人员）；减少（岗位）
data.enText: to make a company or an organization smaller, by reducing the number of jobs in it; to be made smaller in this way

data.chText: 他们正对职工加以重组和裁减。
data.enText: They're restructuring and slimming down the workforce.

data.chText: 这个行业可能还得进一步压缩。
data.enText: The industry may have to slim down even further.

data.chText: 精简人员后的新公司
（非洲）艾滋病

ex.enText: He was lean, tall and muscular.
He has a lean handsome face.

synonyms.bx: 尤指男人或动物瘦而健壮的。

ex.enText: All girls want to be slender.

ex.chText: 桦树有光滑的树皮和细长的树枝。
ex.enText: The birch has smooth bark and slender branches.

synonyms.bx: 多指女性身材修长苗条、体态优美的；形容物体时表示细或窄的。

ex.chText: 她纤弱的身躯因阵阵咳嗽而颤抖。
ex.enText: Her slight frame was shaken by bouts of coughing.
She is trying to get slim.
She goes for tall slim men.

synonyms.bx: 指人身材修长的，常用于减肥者；也可形容书、钱包等薄的。

ex.chText: 就他的年龄而言，这男孩算是瘦的。
ex.enText: The boy was thin for his age.
She is thin in the face.
She was wearing a thin gold chain.

synonyms.bx: 普通用词，指人或身体部位瘦削的，也可形容物体细或薄的。

data.chText: （靠节食等）变苗条，减肥
data.enText: to become thinner, for example as a result of eating less

data.chText: 精简（机构）；裁减（人员）；减少（岗位）
data.enText: to make a company or an organization smaller, by reducing the number of jobs in it; to be made smaller in this way

data.chText: 他们正对职工加以重组和裁减。
data.enText: They're restructuring and slimming down the workforce.

data.chText: 这个行业可能还得进一步压缩。
data.enText: The industry may have to slim down even further.

data.chText: 精简人员后的新公司

tr: being of delicate or slender build
example: she was slender as a willow shoot is slender"- Frank Norri
a slim girl with straight blonde hair
watched her slight figure cross the street

value.def: A slim person has an attractively thin and well-shaped body.

example.ex: The young woman was tall and slim...
example.tran: 那个年轻的女子身材苗条修长。

example.ex: Jean is pretty, of slim build, with blue eyes.
example.tran: 珍妮非常漂亮，身材苗条，有一双蓝色的眼睛。

value.def: If you are slimming, you are trying to make yourself thinner and lighter by eating less food.

example.ex: Some people will gain weight, no matter how hard they try to slim...
example.tran: 有些人无论多么努力地减肥，都会长肉。

example.ex: It makes sense to eat a reasonably balanced diet when slimming.
example.tran: 在减肥过程中保持饮食的营养相对均衡是明智的。

example.ex: Doctors have told Benny to slim down.
...salon treatments that claim to slim down thighs.
example.tran: 据称可以瘦大腿的美容疗法

example.ex: We live in a society which is obsessed with slimming.
example.tran: 我们生活在一个热衷于减肥的社会。

value.def: A slim book, wallet, or other object is thinner than usual.

example.ex: The slim booklets describe a range of services and facilities...
example.tran: 这些薄薄的小册子介绍了一系列服务和设施。

example.ex: He published only three slim volumes of verse in his short life.
example.tran: 在他短暂的一生里，他只出版过 3 卷薄薄的诗集。

value.def: A slim chance or possibility is a very small one.

example.ex: There's still a slim chance that he may become Prime Minister.
example.tran: 他仍然有一丝希望当上首相。

value.def: If an organization slims its products or workers, it reduces the number of them that it has.

example.ex: The company recently slimmed its product line.
example.tran: 公司最近压缩了产品线。

trans: （通过节食）减肥，变苗条；精简（机构）；裁减（人员）
合身版；修身款；修身剪裁
